languages.text: {n}Холодок пробегает по вашей спине. Вы словно снова чувствуете взгляд Зари... только теперь он исходит не от трупа. А отовсюду.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Холодок пробегает по вашей спине. Вы словно снова чувствуете взгляд Зари... только теперь он исходит не от трупа. А отовсюду.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You almost seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it's not coming from her corpse anymore, but from everywhere.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You almost seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it's not coming from her corpse anymore, but from everywhere.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it's not coming from her corpse anymore, but from everywhere.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it's not coming from her corpse anymore, but from everywhere.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}
{n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter. Du scheinst Auroras Blick wieder auf dir zu spüren ... Nur kommt es diesmal nicht mehr von ihrer Leiche, sondern von überall.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter. Du scheinst Auroras Blick wieder auf dir zu spüren ... Nur kommt es diesmal nicht mehr von ihrer Leiche, sondern von überall.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine. Il vous semble sentir à nouveau le regard d'Aurore peser sur vous... sauf que cela ne vient plus de son cadavre, mais de partout.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine. Il vous semble sentir à nouveau le regard d'Aurore peser sur vous... sauf que cela ne vient plus de son cadavre, mais de partout.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一股寒意浸入你的脊背，你仿佛再次感觉到了“极光”的凝视……只是这次，这股凝视不再源自她的尸体，而是来自四面八方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一股寒意浸入你的脊背，你仿佛再次感觉到了‘极光’的凝视……只是这次，这股凝视不再源自她的尸体，而是来自四面八方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}背筋に寒気が走った。再びオーロラの視線を感じるようだが…もはや彼女の死体からだけではなく、あちこちから来ているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}背筋に寒気が走った。再びオーロラの視線を感じるようだが…もはや彼女の死体からではなく、あちこちから来ているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un escalofrío recorre tu espalda. Te parece sentir de nuevo la mirada de Aurora sobre ti... pero ya no viene de su cadáver, sino de todas partes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un escalofrío recorre tu espalda. Te parece sentir de nuevo la mirada de Aurora sobre ti... pero ya no viene de su cadáver, sino de todas partes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ensen aniden ürperiyor. Aurora'nın bakışlarını bir kez daha üzerinde hissediyorsun. Tek farkı bu sefer cesedinden değil de her taraftan geliyor olması.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A chill runs down your spine. You seem to feel Aurora's gaze upon you once again... only it is not coming from her corpse any longer, but from everywhere.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ensen aniden ürperiyor. Aurora'nın bakışlarının yine keskin bir bıçak gibi saplandığını hissediyorsun. Ancak bu sefer sadece cesedin olduğu yönden değil, aynı anda her taraftan gelmiş gibi.{/n}
